item.title: WBA
item.description: score:-91 Chances: More growth than expected and a massive cost-cutting effort are under way. The company notches convincing beats on headline fundamentals in its second-quarter earnings report. Walgreens is in the middle of a turnaround strategy. CEO Tim Wentworth sat down with Yahoo Finance to discuss the company’s new focus.
